availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Bach (Pendleton County, Kentucky, farm worker)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farm worker. Native of Baden. Married to Therrisa Bach. Father of Charles Bach, Jr. Farmer worker in Pendleton County in 1860

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, City/District, p. 557.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, City/District, p. 411A.
